Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma slammed a magnificent half-century
Rohit Sharma completed his 4,000 runs in T20 internationals
Rohit Sharma-Rishabh Pant duo batting well on the crease
Jasprit Bumrah clinched the final wicket
Mohammed Siraj clinched his first wicket of the day
Pre-Game Insights: Team India captain Rohit Sharma slammed a wonderful half-century to lead his team to an 8-wicket victory against Ireland
Paul Stirling-led Ireland was restricted to a low score of 96 runs
Hardik Pandya and other pacers did a wonderful job
Arshdeep Singh leaked some crucial runs in the death overs
Rohit Sharma-led Indian cricket team is all set to kick start its T20 World Cup 2024 campaign at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York
Reports suggest Virat Kohli might open with Rohit Sharma
The Indian cricket team landed in New York in the last week of May and engaged in intense practice sessions and team-building exercises ahead of the tournament
The pitch of Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York has faced criticism for its slow pace, compounded by the additional difficulty for batters due to the sluggish outfield
The Indian team got too comfortable too soon and leaked some runs
Indian openers Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli are playing their game and slamming back-to-back boundaries to inch towards the low 97-run target
The New York pitch is tricky and the Indian batters are batting very cautiously on the unpredictable pitch
Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli will soon begin the 97 run chase and will look to end this game as soon as possible
Arshdeep Singh bowled some extras in the 5th over, which provided some crucial runs to Ireland
Ireland's performance was impressive
Former India opener Aakash Chopra advised not to expect 60 runs in the first six overs every time
Harbhajan Singh recommended big players like Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli to open
The India vs Ireland match is all set to begin at 10:00 AM local time (8:00 PM IST)
There is a 25% chance of rain during the match hours
Rohit Sharma said the wicket might be a good one to bat on and the team will adapt
As per Accuweather.com, the weather in New York is expected to remain cloudy on June 5
Post-Match Reflections: Rishabh Pant slammed the winning six and India is off to a great start in T20 World Cup 2024
Captain Rohit Sharma slammed a half-century, while vice-captain Hardik Pandya clinched 3 wickets
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch of Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York has faced criticism for its slow pace, compounded by the additional difficulty for batters due to the sluggish outfield
